open.title: FrogFoot outage | Verulam
open.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Verulam, affected clients will experience no connectivity. FrogFoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Madadeni Zone 1, Pioneer Park & Newcastle Central, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: MetroFibre| Maintenance
open.description: MetroFibre is conducting maintenance in Etude, Carlswald from the 11th August 2025 at 08:00 to Friday, 15th August 2025 at 17:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
